body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Tyler Hall and the customer's name is Teresa Edwards.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am a customer service representative with XYZ Solutions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Sarah! Nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To assist you better, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also let me know your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three two three, five six seven, eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, John! I've noted both your email and phone number.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great! Thank you for your help, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, John. Have a wonderful day!
